idea-plugin.name: LiterateIt
idea-plugin.description:
A plugin for IntelliJ-based IDEs that transliterates selected text between Cyrillic and Latin keyboard layouts with a single shortcut.
- Converts "Ghbdtn" to "Привет" and vice versa - Smart automatic direction detection (Cyrillic ↔ Latin) - Preserves non-alphabetic characters - Works in all text editors within IntelliJ platform - Configurable keyboard shortcut
